sections.heading: of consumer fireworks; limitations
sections.text: It shall be unlawful to sell any consumer fireworks at retail within this state, outside the limits of any incorporated city or village. Consumer fireworks may be sold at retail only between June 24 and July 5 and between December 28 and January 1 of each year.Sour

28-1249.Sale of consumer fireworks; limitations.

It shall be unlawful to sell any consumer fireworks at retail within this state, outside the limits of any incorporated city or village. Consumer fireworks may be sold at retail only between June 24 and July 5 and between December 28 and January 1 of each year.

SourceLaws 1977, LB 38, ยง 281;Laws 1999, LB 621, ยง 1;Laws 2004, LB 1091, ยง 2;Laws 2010, LB880, ยง 8.
